title: PDF Report Generation Service
description:
Implement PDF Report Generator with Puppeteer

Build a PDF report generation system that converts HTML templates into downloadable PDF documents using Puppeteer.

Requirements:
- Set up Puppeteer as a dependency and configure for server-side rendering
- Create HTML report templates with proper styling that renders well in PDF format
- Implement a service/module that accepts data and generates PDFs from templates
- Handle page formatting (page size, margins, headers, footers, page numbers)
- Support dynamic content injection into templates
- Optimize PDF generation performance (consider reusing browser instances)
- Add error handling for generation failures
- Implement file storage or streaming response for generated PDFs
- Ensure generated PDFs are accessible and properly formatted
- Add configuration options (orientation, paper size, print background graphics)

Edge Cases to Consider:
- Large reports that span multiple pages
- Special characters and Unicode in content
- Images and assets loading in headless environment
- Concurrent PDF generation requests
- Memory management for long-running processes

Dependencies:
- Puppeteer package installation
- HTML/CSS template structure
- Data source for populating reports
- Server endpoint or API route for triggering generation
